description.spanish: Símbolo de adoración, admiración y lealtad. En el amor, representa un amor apasionado y duradero.
description.english: Symbol of adoration, admiration, and loyalty. In love, it represents a passionate and enduring love.

dedication.spanish: Para ti, girasol de mi corazón, eres el sol que ilumina mi vida. Tu amor ardiente me llena de alegría y esperanza.
dedication.english: For you, sunflower of my heart, you are the sun that illuminates my life. Your burning love fills me with joy and hope.

sunflower.prompt: A vibrant sunflower with a large, golden head and dark brown center, standing tall in a field of wheat.

description.spanish: Representa la nueva vida, la esperanza y el renacimiento. En el amor, simboliza el comienzo de una nueva relación.
description.english: Represents new life, hope, and rebirth. In love, it symbolizes the beginning of a new relationship.

dedication.spanish: Narciso, eres la promesa de un nuevo amanecer en mi vida. Tu belleza delicada me llena de esperanza y amor.
dedication.english: Daffodil, you are the promise of a new dawn in my life. Your delicate beauty fills me with hope and love.

daffodil.prompt: A cheerful daffodil with a bright yellow trumpet-shaped flower and long, green leaves, blooming in a spring meadow.

description.spanish: Simboliza la alegría, la inocencia y la belleza. En el amor, representa un amor infantil y puro.
description.english: Symbolizes joy, innocence, and beauty. In love, it represents a childish and pure love.

dedication.spanish: Ranúnculo, eres la chispa de alegría que ilumina mi día. Tu inocencia me llena de amor y felicidad.
dedication.english: Buttercup, you are the spark of joy that illuminates my day. Your innocence fills me with love and happiness.

buttercup.prompt: A field of shimmering buttercups with small, golden flowers and delicate green leaves, swaying gently in the breeze.

description.spanish: Representa la libertad, la esperanza y la alegría. En el amor, simboliza un amor libre y despreocupado.
description.english: Represents freedom, hope, and joy. In love, it symbolizes a free and carefree love.

dedication.spanish: Diente de león, eres la libertad que anhela mi alma. Tu alegría despreocupada me llena de amor y esperanza.
dedication.english: Dandelion, you are the freedom my soul craves. Your carefree joy fills me with love and hope.

dandelion.prompt: A fluffy dandelion with a bright yellow flower head that has gone to seed, dispersing its seeds in the wind.

description.spanish: Simboliza la amistad, la esperanza y la llegada de la primavera. En el amor, representa un amor duradero y lleno de esperanza.
description.english: Symbolizes friendship, hope, and the arrival of spring. In love, it represents a lasting and hopeful love.

dedication.spanish: Forsythia, eres la esperanza que renueva mi corazón. Tu belleza radiante me llena de amor y alegría.
dedication.english: Forsythia, you are the hope that renews my heart. Your radiant beauty fills me with love and joy.

forsythia.prompt: A flowering forsythia bush with a cascade of bright yellow blossoms, covering its branches before the leaves emerge.

description.spanish: Representa la alegría, la belleza y la admiración. En el amor, simboliza un amor lleno de admiración y respeto.
description.english: Represents joy, beauty, and admiration. In love, it symbolizes a love filled with admiration and respect.

dedication.spanish: Coreopsis, eres la estrella que ilumina mi camino. Tu admiración silenciosa me llena de amor y respeto.
dedication.english: Coreopsis, you are the star that illuminates my path. Your silent admiration fills me with love and respect.

coreopsis.prompt: A cluster of coreopsis flowers with vibrant yellow petals and dark brown centers, attracting butterflies and bees.

description.spanish: Simboliza la justicia, la lealtad y la confianza. En el amor, representa un amor fuerte y duradero.
description.english: Symbolizes justice, loyalty, and trust. In love, it represents a strong and lasting love.

dedication.spanish: Rudbeckia, eres la lealtad que siempre me acompaña. Tu amor inquebrantable me llena de confianza y seguridad.
dedication.english: Black-eyed Susan, you are the loyalty that always accompanies me. Your unwavering love fills me with trust and security.

black-eyed-susan.prompt: A black-eyed Susan with a bright yellow petal ring surrounding a dark brown center, growing in a wildflower meadow.

description.spanish: Representa la amistad, la alegría y la esperanza. En el amor, simboliza un amor platónico o un amor que está floreciendo.
description.english: Represents friendship, joy, and hope. In love, it symbolizes a platonic love or a love that is blossoming.

dedication.spanish: Rosa amarilla, eres la esperanza que ilumina mi futuro. Tu amor naciente me llena de ilusión y alegría.
dedication.english: Yellow Rose, you are the hope that illuminates my future. Your nascent love fills me with excitement and joy.

yellow-rose.prompt: A single yellow rose with velvety petals and a long, thorny stem, standing in a vase of water.

description.spanish: Simboliza la esperanza, la felicidad y el amor perfecto. En el amor, representa un amor ideal y lleno de felicidad.
description.english: Symbolizes hope, happiness, and perfect love. In love, it represents an ideal and joyful love.

dedication.spanish: Tulipán amarillo, eres la felicidad que anhelo en mi vida. Tu amor ideal me llena de paz y satisfacción.
dedication.english: Yellow Tulip, you are the happiness I long for in my life. Your ideal love fills me with peace and satisfaction.

yellow-tulip.prompt: A field of yellow tulips with tall, slender stems and cup-shaped flowers, blooming in the spring.

description.spanish: Representa la belleza, la pasión y la riqueza. En el amor, simboliza un amor intenso y apasionado.
description.english: Represents beauty, passion, and wealth. In love, it symbolizes an intense and passionate love.

dedication.spanish: Hibisco amarillo, eres la pasión que arde en mi corazón. Tu amor intenso me llena de deseo y emoción.
dedication.english: Yellow Hibiscus, you are the passion that burns in my heart. Your intense love fills me with desire and excitement.

yellow-hibiscus.prompt: A tropical yellow hibiscus flower with large, delicate petals and a long, slender stamen, growing on a lush green plant.
